trip.remarks: Stopped en route to the United States.

trip.remarks: Met with President Cardoso and Foreign Minister Lampreia.

trip.remarks: Met with President De la Rua and Foreign Minister Giavarini.

trip.remarks: Met with President Lagos and Foreign Minister Alvear.

trip.remarks: Met with President Banzer and Foreign Minister de la Rocha.

trip.remarks: Met with President Noboa and the Foreign and Defense Ministers.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Stopped en route to Washington.

trip.remarks: Accompanied President Clinton.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Discussed NATO issues with Foreign Minister Asgrimsson.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Opened American Presence Post at Bordeaux; attended U.S.-EU Ministerial Meeting and met with President Chirac.

trip.remarks: Attended ceremonies commemorating the 10th anniversary of German reunification.

trip.remarks: Discussed the Israeli-Palestinian conflict with Prime Minister Barak and Chairman Arafat.

trip.remarks: Discussed the Israeli-Palestinian conflict with President Mubarak, Foreign Minister Moussa, and Chairman Arafat.

trip.remarks: Accompanied President Clinton to the Israeli-Palestinian Summit Meeting.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Discussed the Middle East peace process with King Fahd and senior officials; also met with Syrian President Bashar Assad.

trip.remarks: Met with President Kim Jong Il and senior officials.

trip.remarks: Met with President Kim Dae Jung and the Foreign Ministers of South Korea and Japan.

trip.remarks: Accompanied President Clinton to the APEC Leaders' Meeting.

trip.remarks: Attended OSCE Ministerial Council meeting.

trip.remarks: Led the U.S. delegation to the inauguration of President Fox.

trip.remarks: Met with President Mbeki and Foreign Minister Zuma; delivered addresses on public health issues.

trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Jugnauth.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Met with President Mogai and Foreign Minister Marafhe.

trip.remarks: Witnessed the signing of the Ethiopia-Eritrea Peace Agreement.

trip.name: Madeleine Korbel Albright
trip.remarks: Met with Prime Minister Orban and Foreign Minister Martony; received an honorary degree from Szeged University.

trip.remarks: Attended NATO and NATO-Russia Permanent Joint Council Ministerial meetings.

trip.remarks: Met with King Juan Carlos and signed Joint Declaration.

trip.remarks: Met with Foreign Minister Vedrine and other European Foreign Ministers.
